1: וְהָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>shall be when</n> תָב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>And it shall be when thou [art] come in</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>unto the land</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> נֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָ֑ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>thee [for] an inheritance</n> וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֖הּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>and possessest</n> וְיָשַׁ֥בְתָּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>it and dwellest</n> בָּֽהּ׃
2: וְלָקַחְתָּ֞ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>That thou shalt take</n> מֵרֵאשִׁ֣ית ׀ <sup>7225 </sup> <n>of the first</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> פְּרִ֣י <sup>6529 </sup> <n>of all the fruit</n> הָאֲדָמָ֗ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תָּבִ֧יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>which thou shalt bring</n> מֵֽאַרְצְךָ֛ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of thy land</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> נֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> לָ֖ךְ וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>thee and shalt put</n> בַטֶּ֑נֶא <sup>2935 </sup> <n>[it] in a basket</n> וְהָֽלַכְתָּ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and shalt go</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמָּק֔וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>unto the place</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִבְחַר֙ <sup>977 </sup> <n>shall choose</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>to place</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> שָֽׁם׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n>
3: וּבָאתָ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And thou shalt go</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>unto the priest</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יִהְיֶ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַּיָּמִ֣ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>that shall be in those days</n> הָהֵ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> הִגַּ֤דְתִּי <sup>5046 </sup> <n>unto him I profess</n> הַיּוֹם֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>this day</n> לַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בָ֙אתִי֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>that I am come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>unto the country</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>sware</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> לַאֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto our fathers</n> לָ֥תֶת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>for to give</n> לָֽנוּ׃
4: וְלָקַ֧ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>shall take</n> הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>And the priest</n> הַטֶּ֖נֶא <sup>2935 </sup> <n>the basket</n> מִיָּדֶ֑ךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of thine hand</n> וְהִ֨נִּיח֔וֹ <sup>3240 </sup> <n>and set it down</n> לִפְנֵ֕י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> מִזְבַּ֖ח <sup>4196 </sup> <n>the altar</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n>
5: וְעָנִ֨יתָ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>And thou shalt speak</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֲרַמִּי֙ <sup>761 </sup> <n>A Syrian</n> אֹבֵ֣ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>ready to perish</n> אָבִ֔י <sup>1 </sup> <n>[was] my father</n> וַיֵּ֣רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>and he went down</n> מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <sup>4714 </sup> <n>into Egypt</n> וַיָּ֥גָר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>and sojourned</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> בִּמְתֵ֣י <sup>4462 </sup> <n>Memucan</n> מְעָ֑ט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>a few</n> וַֽיְהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> שָׁ֕ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> לְג֥וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>and became there a nation</n> גָּד֖וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>great</n> עָצ֥וּם <sup>6099 </sup> <n>mighty</n> וָרָֽב׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and populous</n>
6: וַיָּרֵ֧עוּ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>evil entreated</n> אֹתָ֛נוּ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> הַמִּצְרִ֖ים <sup>4713 </sup> <n>And the Egyptians</n> וַיְעַנּ֑וּנוּ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>us and afflicted</n> וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>us and laid</n> עָלֵ֖ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עֲבֹדָ֥ה <sup>5656 </sup> <n>bondage</n> קָשָֽׁה׃ <sup>7186 </sup> <n>upon us hard</n>
7: וַנִּצְעַ֕ק <sup>6817 </sup> <n>And when we cried</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of our fathers</n> וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> קֹלֵ֔נוּ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>our voice</n> וַיַּ֧רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and looked</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עָנְיֵ֛נוּ <sup>6040 </sup> <n>on our affliction</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲמָלֵ֖נוּ <sup>5999 </sup> <n>and our labour</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לַחֲצֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>3906 </sup> <n>and our oppression</n>
8: וַיּוֹצִאֵ֤נוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>brought us forth</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>out of Egypt</n> בְּיָ֤ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> חֲזָקָה֙ <sup>2389 </sup> <n>with a mighty</n> וּבִזְרֹ֣עַ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>arm</n> נְטוּיָ֔ה <sup>5186 </sup> <n>and with an outstretched</n> וּבְמֹרָ֖א <sup>4172 </sup> <n>terribleness</n> גָּדֹ֑ל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and with great</n> וּבְאֹת֖וֹת <sup>226 </sup> <n>and with signs</n> וּבְמֹפְתִֽים׃ <sup>4159 </sup> <n>and with wonders</n>
9: וַיְבִאֵ֖נוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And he hath brought</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַמָּק֣וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>us into this place</n> הַזֶּ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n> וַיִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and hath given</n> לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>us this land</n> הַזֹּ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> אֶ֛רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>[even] a land</n> זָבַ֥ת <sup>2100 </sup> <n>that floweth</n> חָלָ֖ב <sup>2461 </sup> <n>with milk</n> וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>and honey</n>
10: וְעַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> הֵבֵ֙אתִי֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And now behold I have brought</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רֵאשִׁית֙ <sup>7225 </sup> <n>the first</n> פְּרִ֣י <sup>6529 </sup> <n>of the produce</n> הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>of the land</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נָתַ֥תָּה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hast given</n> לִּ֖י יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which thou O LORD</n> וְהִנַּחְתּ֗וֹ <sup>3240 </sup> <n>me And thou shalt set</n> לִפְנֵי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>it before</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֔יתָ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and worship</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n>
11: וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֣ <sup>8056 </sup> <n>glad</n> בְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַטּ֗וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>in every good</n> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> נָֽתַן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath given</n> לְךָ֛ יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[thing] which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> וּלְבֵיתֶ֑ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto thee and unto thine house</n> אַתָּה֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>and you</n> וְהַלֵּוִ֔י <sup>3881 </sup> <n>thou and the Levite</n> וְהַגֵּ֖ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>and the stranger</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>that [is] among</n> ס
12: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תְכַלֶּ֞ה <sup>3615 </sup> <n>When thou hast made an end</n> לַ֠עְשֵׂר <sup>6237 </sup> <n>of tithing</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַעְשַׂ֧ר <sup>4643 </sup> <n>all the tithes</n> תְּבוּאָתְךָ֛ <sup>8393 </sup> <n>of thine increase</n> בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֖ת <sup>7992 </sup> <n>the third</n> שְׁנַ֣ת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>[which is] the year</n> הַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֑ר <sup>4643 </sup> <n>of tithing</n> וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and hast given</n> לַלֵּוִ֗י <sup>3881 </sup> <n>[it] unto the Levite</n> לַגֵּר֙ <sup>1616 </sup> <n>the stranger</n> לַיָּת֣וֹם <sup>3490 </sup> <n>the fatherless</n> וְלָֽאַלְמָנָ֔ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>and the widow</n> וְאָכְל֥וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>that they may eat</n> בִשְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>within thy gates</n> וְשָׂבֵֽעוּ׃ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and be filled</n>
13: וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then thou shalt say</n> לִפְנֵי֩ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בִּעַ֧רְתִּי <sup>1197 </sup> <n>I have brought away</n> הַקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>the hallowed things</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>any</n> הַבַּ֗יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>out of [mine] house</n> וְגַ֨ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>and also</n> נְתַתִּ֤יו <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and also have given</n> לַלֵּוִי֙ <sup>3881 </sup> <n>them unto the Levite</n> וְלַגֵּר֙ <sup>1616 </sup> <n>and unto the stranger</n> לַיָּת֣וֹם <sup>3490 </sup> <n>to the fatherless</n> וְלָאַלְמָנָ֔ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>and to the widow</n> כְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> מִצְוָתְךָ֖ <sup>4687 </sup> <n>according to all thy commandments</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> צִוִּיתָ֑נִי <sup>6680 </sup> <n>which thou hast commanded</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> עָבַ֥רְתִּי <sup>5674 </sup> <n>me I have not transgressed</n> מִמִּצְוֹתֶ֖יךָ <sup>4687 </sup> <n>thy commandments</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃ <sup>7911 </sup> <n>neither have I forgotten</n>
14: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> אָכַ֨לְתִּי <sup>398 </sup> <n>I have not eaten</n> בְאֹנִ֜י <sup>205 </sup> <n>thereof in my mourning</n> מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>any</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> בִעַ֤רְתִּי <sup>1197 </sup> <n>neither have I taken away</n> מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>any</n> בְּטָמֵ֔א <sup>2931 </sup> <n>[ought] thereof for [any] unclean</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> נָתַ֥תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>[use] nor given</n> מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>any</n> לְמֵ֑ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>[ought] thereof for the dead</n> שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <sup>8085 </sup> <n>[but] I have hearkened</n> בְּקוֹל֙ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>to the voice</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהָ֔י <sup>430 </sup> <n>my God</n> עָשִׂ֕יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[and] have done</n> כְּכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> צִוִּיתָֽנִי׃ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>according to all that thou hast commanded</n>
15: הַשְׁקִיפָה֩ <sup>8259 </sup> <n>Look down</n> מִמְּע֨וֹן <sup>4583 </sup> <n>habitation</n> קָדְשְׁךָ֜ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>from thy holy</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>from heaven</n> וּבָרֵ֤ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>and bless</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמְּךָ֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>thy people</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> וְאֵת֙ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>and the land</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נָתַ֖תָּה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which thou hast given</n> לָ֑נוּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתָּ֙ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>us as thou swarest</n> לַאֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto our fathers</n> אֶ֛רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>a land</n> זָבַ֥ת <sup>2100 </sup> <n>that floweth</n> חָלָ֖ב <sup>2461 </sup> <n>with milk</n> וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>and honey</n> ס
16: הַיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>This day</n> הַזֶּ֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> מְצַוְּךָ֧ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>hath commanded</n> לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>thee to do</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֻקִּ֥ים <sup>2706 </sup> <n>these statutes</n> הָאֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֑ים <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and judgments</n> וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֤ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>thou shalt therefore keep</n> וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> אוֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> לְבָבְךָ֖ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>them with all thine heart</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and with all thy soul</n>
17: אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> הֶאֱמַ֖רְתָּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thou hast avouched</n> הַיּ֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>this day</n> לִהְיוֹת֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְךָ֨ לֵֽאלֹהִ֜ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>to be thy God</n> וְלָלֶ֣כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walk</n> בִּדְרָכָ֗יו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in his ways</n> וְלִשְׁמֹ֨ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>and to keep</n> חֻקָּ֧יו <sup>2706 </sup> <n>his statutes</n> וּמִצְוֹתָ֛יו <sup>4687 </sup> <n>and his commandments</n> וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and his judgments</n> וְלִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and to hearken</n> בְּקֹלֽוֹ׃ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>unto his voice</n>
18: וַֽיהוָ֞ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> הֶאֱמִֽירְךָ֣ <sup>559 </sup> <n>hath avouched</n> הַיּ֗וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thee this day</n> לִהְי֥וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לוֹ֙ לְעַ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> סְגֻלָּ֔ה <sup>5459 </sup> <n>to be his peculiar</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> דִּבֶּר־ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>as he hath promised</n> לָ֑ךְ וְלִשְׁמֹ֖ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>thee and that [thou] shouldest keep</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִצְוֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>4687 </sup> <n>all his commandments</n>
19: וּֽלְתִתְּךָ֣ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And to make</n> עֶלְי֗וֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>thee high</n> עַ֤ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַגּוֹיִם֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>above all nations</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which he hath made</n> לִתְהִלָּ֖ה <sup>8416 </sup> <n>in praise</n> וּלְשֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>and in name</n> וּלְתִפְאָ֑רֶת <sup>8597 </sup> <n>and in honour</n> וְלִֽהְיֹתְךָ֧ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> קָדֹ֛שׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>and that thou mayest be an holy</n> לַיהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> דִּבֵּֽר׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>as he hath spoken</n> ס
